Class OneKeyValueInputFormat

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
      org.systemsbiology.hadoop.OneKeyValueInputFormat

public class OneKeyValueInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>

org.systemsbiology.hadoop.OneKeyValueInputFormat This si designed to return exactly One Kay Value pair - The Key is aclled "KEY" and the Value is "Value" The class is designed to force Map Reduce to run once and is specificlly designed for testing environmental issues User: steven Date: Aug 16, 2010
